name: Jump Forever!
description:
Welcome to Jump Forever!
This game is a game created under Unity 4.
It is for Windows (for the moment)
Jump Forever is a game inspired by the French rabies simulators created by NICO.
It is an extremely raging game, the game is not allowed to violent people.


In the game, you play a character.
He is a mechanic and he must absolutely finish the jump to teleport to his garage, because he had an appointment with a very important customer because his car broke down in less than a day! You must finish the Jump before you go back to the garage.

In this game, there is NO checkpoint! NO CHECKPOINT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
(if you remember, it's a game of rage)

By downloading the game, you agree to be paid by Dariana and Itch.io for any insurance.
